results.content: Clear, excellent course.  Would have given it five stars had the tutor not abandoned answering questions years ago. Despite this, really got a lot out of this course.  Not looking back.
results.content_html: Clear, excellent course. Would have given it five stars had the tutor not abandoned answering questions years ago. Despite this, really got a lot out of this course. Not looking back.

results.content:
Pertinent, comprehensive, detailed, and lots of other adjectives.
The Instructor knows his stuff and is a clear communicator.

results.content: Easy course  but contains very good information on HTML 5 and How to provide fallback options for older browsers.  The instructor is very clear and easy too understand.
results.content_html: Easy course but contains very good information on HTML 5 and How to provide fallback options for older browsers. The instructor is very clear and easy too understand.

results.content:
The course was too basic. Not a masterclass. It's just shows how to use the different parameters of the video and audio tag. There is no added value on int.

The course will be fine if it's price is lower. The cost/benefit is unbalanced.
